entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
